lines: 1. Yie mar kwerewa pod nitieBang` loyo twech sand kod mach be;Chunywa opong` gi mor chuthoKawawinjo wachni maber.
Yie mar kwerewa yie maber,Wanasikie nyaka giko.
2. Twech mar kwerewa e mudhoNe ok oketho yie margi;Dibed maber ni nyithindgiKa gin bende giyie kuome.
3. Yie mar kwerewa wanaherOsiepe, wasigu bende;Kendo wanalandi gi heraKod weche mang`uon mag ngima.
